title: KIND Soft Baked Granola, Dark Chocolate Chunk, Healthy Snacks, Gluten Free, 100% Whole Grains, 4g Protein, 11oz, 1 Count
about_this_item: Includes one, 11 oz. bag of KIND Soft Baked Granola Dark Chocolate Chunk clusters
KIND Soft Baked Granola is a soft and chewy alternative to traditional granola that combines 100% whole grain oats with indulgent ingredients like rich, dark chocolate chunks
Contains a full serving of whole grains(27g per 55g serving), is a good source of fiber*, gluten free, low in sodium*, kosher, and Non-GMO Project Verified; *7g fat per serving
Perfect for enjoying as a snack by the handful or as a part of your breakfast
Available in resealable snack bags
Healthy snacks are smarter snacks. Snack KIND!
ingredients: Oats, tapioca syrup, canola oil, cane sugar, semi-sweet chocolate (sugar, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, vanilla extract), sunflower seed butter, tapioca starch, brown rice, vegetable glycerin, chicory root fiber, cocoa powder, natural flavor, sea salt, brown rice syrup, Vitamin E (tocopherols to maintain freshness).
product_description: Unlike traditional crunchy granola, KIND Soft Baked Granola has a unique soft and chewy texture. These clusters are made with 100% whole grain oats and indulgent ingredients like rich dark chocolate chunks making them perfect to enjoy as a part of your breakfast or as a tasty snack by the handful! These gluten free soft baked granola snacks contain no sugar alcohols and 0g trans fat. KIND Soft Baked Granola is a good source of fiber*, low sodium, gluten free and made with Non-GMO Project Verified ingredients.*7g fat per serving, based on 55g serving size.
